manufacturer: The company that manufactured the CRT.
model: The specific model number or name.
year: The year the CRT was manufactured or released.
brandSeries: The product line or series (e.g., TruFlat, Kirara Basso, D-Series). If there is "base" branding, write both the branding and the series. Ex: Trinitron Prism, Trinitron Citation, etc.
purpose: The intended use of the CRT.
market: The geographic market for which this CRT was designed.
hotChassis: Whether the chassis is electrically connected to the AC line.
customName: Custom display for noting multiple series if applicable, ie: "Trinitron" + "WEGA". Subject to change or removal during moderator review.
screenSize: The visible screen size, measured diagonally.
tubeSize: The actual tube size, which may be larger than the visible screen
tubeModel: The specific model number of the CRT tube
tubeType: The type of CRT tube technology used
tubeTVL: TV Lines - the horizontal resolution capability of the tube
horizontalScanRate: The range of horizontal scanning frequencies supported
hasOSD: Whether the CRT has an on-screen display menu
hasServiceMenu: Whether a service menu is accessible
chassis16x9Capable: Whether the chassis supports 16:9 aspect ratio
horizontalOutputTransistor: The part number of the horizontal output transistor
flybackTransformer: The part number of the flyback transformer
verticalDeflectionIC: The integrated circuit used for vertical deflection
supportedVideoSystems: The video standards supported (NTSC, PAL, SECAM, etc.)
aspectRatio: The native aspect ratio of the display
tintedTube: Whether the tube has tinted glass
removeableTint: Whether the tint can be removed
power: Power specifications including voltage, frequency, and wattage
remote: Whether a remote control is included
launchMSRP: The original retail price at launch
similarModels: Other CRT models that are similar or related
description: General description and notes about the CRT
serviceMenu: Instructions for accessing the service menu
documentation: Links to manuals, service documentation, etc.
